composition: Shell: 38% Polyester, 32% Acrylic, 21% Rayon, 9% Spandex/ Lining: 66% Nylon, 34% Spandex

composition: Shell: 62% Polyester, 29% Cupro, 9% Spandex/ Lining: 64% Nylon, 36% Spandex

title: Fair & Fave Cropped Pocket Tee
description: Favorite is an understatement. The perfectly flattering boxy oversized crop and cozy pocket tee. Details matter. Not too short, not too long and this relaxed fit tee features saw unfinished seams at shoulder, pocket,  bottom and sleeve hem. Round neckline with ribbed and unfinished detailing and dropped shoulders. Made from our signature organic cotton using only eco-friendly dyes. Sustainable tshirts to feel good about.

title: Galaxy Tie- Dye Commissioned  Tshirt By Dee Silkie
description: It’s a best-selling style—with a tie-dye twist. Our signature responsibly-made short sleeve t-shirt is hand-dipped dyed by local artist Dee Silkie.  Plus, each tee has a one-of-a-kind tie-dye variation that gives it a unique look.  To learn more about Dee’s work check out our feature on the blog.

title: Indigo (blue)  Dye Kit + Good Tee Unisex
description: Looking for something fun, guilt-free and creative to do? We’ve got a really GOOD project for you. Introducing our Indigo dye kit, complete with a Good Tee, gives the beginner dyer a perfect introduction into the beauty and wonder of creating colour from nature and customizing your own unique t-shirt.  The best part about this is it’s sustainable, a guilt-free project, with minimal environmental impact. Indigo (indigofera tinctoria) species are the world's only source of natural, true, colourfast blue. A magical dyestuff that has been used around the world as a dye since pre-historic times, the culture and wonder that surrounds this plant is immense.Indigo cannot be dyed in the same way as other dyes, but must be used to create a "living" vat, which is achieved through a sort of fermentation process.==============================Kit Contains:A t-shirt in any size you need. Included are the ingredients to dye around 2-3 medium adult t-shirts and rubber bands. The kit also includes comprehensive instructions on how to create and use the vat. To purchase additional tees, will be 50% discount automatic at checkout.This kit contains the pre-measured ingredients to create one organic fructose vat, with which you can dye quite a bit of fibre - how much a kit will dye depends on a few things, including how dark you want the blue to be, and what fibres you use. But it will dye a lot! As a general ballpark, you could expect to dye at least 2-3 t-shirts to a medium blue, and probably more, and darker if you wish.indigofera tinctoria powder, extracted from the plant, pickling lime (calx), and fructose sugar.Please note that the dyed fibres in the photos are not included. They are there to show you what colours you can expect to achieve with the dye. ==============================Dye Contents:20g indigofera tinctoria powder, extracted from the plant, 40g pickling lime (calx), 60g fructose sugar.

title: Natural Dye Kit Cochineal & Ground Madder Root (pink and orange) + Good Tee Unisex
description: Looking for something fun, guilt-free and creative to do? We’ve got a really GOOD project for you. Introducing our natural dye kit, complete with a Good Tee, gives the beginner dyer a perfect introduction into the beauty and wonder of creating colour from nature and customizing your own unique t-shirt.  The best part about this, is it’s sustainable, a guilt-free project, with minimal environmental impact.==============================Kit Contains:A t-shirt in any size you need with rubber bands. Comprehensive instructions in the kit will take you through the step by step process of preparing your fibres and dyeing with these dried dyestuffs.Included are the ingredients to dye around 2-3 medium adult t-shirts. To purchase additional tees, will be 50% discount automatic at checkout.Alum (a food safe ingredient made of potassium aluminum sulfate) as the mordant(for colourfast), and Gallnut, tannin powder made from the galls formed on oak trees, for pre-mordanting.Ground madder root (rubia tinctoria) for lovely peachy orange shades, and Cochineal (dactylopius coccus) for pink.Please note that the dyed fibres in the photos are not included. They are there to show you what colours you can expect to achieve with the dye.==============================Dye Contents:35 g alum, 25g gallnut, 15g madder, 7g cochineal

title: Rainbow Tie- Dye Commissioned  Tshirt By Dee Silkie
description: It’s a best-selling style—with a tie-dye twist. Our signature responsibly-made short sleeve t-shirt is hand-dipped dyed by local artist Dee Silkie.  Plus, each tee has a one-of-a-kind tie-dye variation that gives it a unique look.  To learn more about Dee’s work check out our feature on the blog.

title: The Classic Eco-Jersey Youth Tee
description: Our gender-neutral short sleeve t-shirt, a tried-and-true classic, is softer than a baby's you-know-what. It has the modern fit of a well-loved favorite, and features reinforced back neck binding for added durability. And the bonus? It’s sustainable, so you can do your part for the planet while chilling in your new favorite go-to tee. Make Mother Nature Proud with this versatile staple that will serve you well for years to come. Certified Fairtrade organic cotton & eco-friendly dyesSuper-soft, single jerseySoft rib neck Reinforced back, neck and shoulder binding for added durabilityThe purrfect gender-neutral fitDesigned in Canada, Ethically Made in India. Radical Supply Chain Transparency

description: This perfectly flattering V-neck is made of super soft 100% organic slub jersey. Why organic? This  ¾ sleeve tee features a trendy curved unfinished shirttail hem and a relaxed fit for casual comfort. title: The Slim Fit Organic Cotton Long Sleeve Tee
description: Our signature long sleeve tee is an ideal basic with a flattering slight contour at the waist and longer length. This shirt was designed both with purpose and with you in mind. Made entirely of organic cotton – a fibre that naturally biodegrades once disposed of – this product allows you to rest easy, knowing that it biodegrades in 20 years, unlike synthetics (such as polyester) that take up to 200 years to decompose.  Plus, it's so comfortable, it will no doubt become your new fave tee you’ll need in every color. Certified Fairtrade organic cotton & eco-friendly dyesSuper-soft, single jerseyRound self-bound neckSlightly contoured fit, longer lengthReinforced shoulder binding for added durability Designed in Canada, Ethically Made in India. Radical Supply Chain Transparency*** SUGGESTED TO SIZE UP ****

title: The Sustainable Coconut Button Henley
description: We have updated the classic cap-sleeved henley with a longer front placket with coconut buttons – because plastic is, like, so last year! Made from strong 100% organic fibers that are naturally durable, comfortable and luxuriously soft. No need to feel bad about wearing it every day, you're conserving water and energy, so you can rest assured that you're in Mother Nature's good books.
